tool_description: COVID-19 Updated using Goverment Database | Coded With ❤️ By Hritik R
title: COVID-19 INDIA

api_list.name: Get Info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-india2.p.rapidapi.com/getinfo.php"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-india2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Latest Updates
api_list.description: Coronavirus India Live Guidelines, Bills, etc
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-india2.p.rapidapi.com/latest.php"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-india2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
